what: Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp Student
description: Applying Agile methodology to learning a full stack consisting of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Mongo, Node, Express, and React

Managed and advised partnering institutions on digital file management needs, designed and built workflows to support the project’s ability to handle born-digital objects. Created Python based scripts to expedite processing and management of digital files and file packages

Developed policies and workflows, documented procedures, managed assistants, developed the Colorado State Archives’ Digital Preservation Policy. Performed mass metadata collation, normalization, and transformation for ingest into the State Archives’ content management system

where: Media Archeology Lab | University of Colorado, Boulder
description: Obtained, cataloged, and preserved the bitstreams of digital artistic media stored on a variety of obsolete media formats through use of digital forensics tools
